definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Technology-the combination of curves and lines is like notes struck, demonstrating the concepts of aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 曲線與平滑的結合，像律動的音符，詮釋着美的概念。

sentences.english: Look forward to the year of the monkey you like the rhythm of the music, make a better life.
sentences.chinese: 期待猴年的你像這律動的音樂，湊出生活美好樂章。

sentences.english: The two forces of mind and prana maintain the rhythm of life and consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 思想和生命兩種力量維持着生命和意識的律動。

sentences.english: In time, all humans will join this rhythm with nature.
sentences.chinese: 到時候，所有物種將加入這大自然的律動中。

sentences.english: Snake charmers usually use either music or body movements to control snakes.
sentences.chinese: 弄蛇人往往會用音樂或身體律動來控制蛇。

sentences.english: III. To investigate the influences of "eurhythmics" toward student's learning interest in fourth graders elementary music class.
sentences.chinese: 探討肢體律動對於國小四年級音樂課學習興趣之影響。

sentences.english: Body rhythm plays an important role in Zither performance, learning and teaching.
sentences.chinese: 體態律動對古箏演奏及教學有着重要作用。

sentences.english: Inter-thread contains wizard such as green as bright rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 脈絡間蘊藏着如綠色精靈般閃亮的律動。

sentences.english: The movement of the body releases a poem and then confirms its rhythmic identity.
sentences.chinese: 身體的律動脫胎出詩歌，並且捋順他的節奏。

sentences.english: The console is being developed by Beijing eedoo Technology Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 該遊戲控制檯正由北京聯合律動科技有限公司研發。

sentences.english: The rhythm of the dynamos is the pulse of nightmare .
sentences.chinese: 發電機的節奏是惡夢的律動。

definition: to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
to throb/to pulse/to bounce/to jiggle/to jump about
